misalignments.reasoning: Spec requires error responses in format {error: {code, message}}, and while API correctly returns this format, the login page displays data.error (entire object) instead of data.error.message, which would show '[object Object]' instead of the human-readable message

Spec requires error responses in format {error: {code, message}}, and while API correctly returns this format, the register page displays data.error (entire object) instead of data.error.message, which would show '[object Object]' instead of the human-readable message
Spec requires dashboard to display the logged-in user's actual name, but implementation uses hardcoded mock data ('User') instead of fetching and displaying the real user's name
